column2: of course we had to get deep dish pizza. After careful Yelp research
column3: we chose Lou Malnati's. There were 5 of us so we ordered a large Chicago classic. 4 of us were full off a slice so that leaves 4 slices right? My boyfriend ate half the pizza by himself... Impressive or gross
column5: the pizza was good. Lots of meat and cheese. I think there should've been more sauce because it was on the dry side. I was disappointed by the crust. I thought there would be more flavor but it was so plain. The server was friendly and attentive. Next time I'm in Chicago
column6: I'll have to see if there's better.
